question.en-US: Can you help me find the position of the chair?
question.zh-CN: 你能帮我找到椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以帮我搵到椅子的位置吗？

question.en-US: Can you identify where the keyboard is in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定键盘在场景中的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定鍵盤喺場景中嘅位置呀？

question.en-US: Where can I find the closest tv to me?
question.zh-CN: 在哪里可以找到离我最近的电视？
question.zh-HK: 喺邊度可以搵到離我最近嘅電視？

question.en-US: Can you point out the mouse in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能指出场景中的鼠标吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以指出場景中嘅鼠標啊？

question.en-US: Could you identify where the tv is?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定电视在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定電視喺邊度呀？

question.en-US: Where is the nearest keyboard to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的键盘在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅鍵盤喺邊度？

question.en-US: Where is the chair that is closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的椅子在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅椅子喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you help me find the position of the chair?
question.zh-CN: 你能帮我找到椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以帮我搵到椅子的位置吗？

question.en-US: Where is the chair that is closest to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的椅子在哪里？
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅椅子喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you please locate the tv?
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以搵到電視啊？

question.en-US: Can you identify where the keyboard is in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能确定键盘在场景中的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能肯定鍵盤喺場景中嘅位置呀？

question.en-US: Can you direct me to the location of the chair?
question.zh-CN: 你能把我引向椅子的位置吗？
question.zh-HK: 你能把我引向椅子的位置嗎？

question.en-US: Which way should I look to find the tv from here?
question.zh-CN: 我应该从这里往哪个方向寻找电视？
question.zh-HK: 我應該從這裡往哪個方向尋找電視？

question.en-US: Where is the closest tv in relation to me?
question.zh-CN: 离我最近的电视在哪里?
question.zh-HK: 離我最近嘅電視喺邊度？

question.en-US: Can you point out the mouse in the scene?
question.zh-CN: 你能指出场景中的鼠标吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以指出場景中嘅鼠標啊？

question.en-US: Which direction is the chair located from where I am now?
question.zh-CN: 椅子位于我现在所在的哪个方向？
question.zh-HK: 椅子位於我而家所在嘅邊個方向？

question.en-US: Can you please locate the tv?
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以搵到電視啊？

question.en-US: Can you show me where the keyboard is?
question.zh-CN: 你能告诉我键盘在哪里吗？
question.zh-HK: 你可唔可以話我鍵盤喺邊度啊？
